title: Quality Measures Challenging in Pharmaceutical Value-Based Contracts
description: Healthcare payers have to contribute higher amounts of data and managerial oversight alongside pharmaceutical companies to support value based contracting.

title: Three Tips to Manage Clinical Denials
description: Clinical denials can be difficult to manage. Learn three tips for managing major payor denial reasons such as medical necessity or no authorization.

description: Bonnie Cassidy, MPA, principal of advisory services at nThrive and former president and chair of the American Health Information Management Association (AHIMA), recaps her MACRA presentation at AHIMA.

description: At nThrive, we take every opportunity to develop and grow as technology continues to evolve every day. Learn more about what happened at Technology Day!

description: Howard Salmon, senior consulting director at nThrive has been appointed board chair of ACHD.

title: HIMSS issues interoperability call-to-action
description: Improved interoperability requires integrating exchange frameworks, improving usability, earning the engagement of caregivers and patients, and more. Learn more in this next article.

title: Why Healthcare Providers Should Embrace Innovative EHR Use
description: Innovative EHR use presents new opportunities to reduce spending, improve patient safety, and eliminate excessive procedures.

title: AHA Supports Bundled Payment Cancellation and Voices MACRA Concerns
description: Changes to three models for bundled payments could have negative consequences for hospitals implementing advanced alternative payment models under MACRA.

title: Friday, October 20th, Atlanta is Wearing Red Capes
description: On Friday, Oct. 20, people across Atlanta will come together for "Cape Day" by wearing a cape and sending a message to young patients that nothing is impossible when you're wearing a cape.

author.name: Former Rep. Jim Greenwood (R-Pa.), opinion contributor

title: The future of drug pricing: Value over volume
description: As the drug pricing debate continues, there are some key facts to keep in mind about a value-based model that highlight why it’s important for patients and the future of biomedical innovation.

title: Physicians feel sidelined in value-based care discussion
description: Many physicians feel sidelined in the healthcare industry's transition to value-based care. But when they feel included in the decision-making process, they're more likely to embrace change.

title: Dignity Health hospital to cover all of Las Vegas shooting victims' medical bills
description: This hospital is reaching out to take in Las Vegas victims and help them recover at no cost. Learn more in this next article.

title: Clinical Data Integrity and Why It Matters for MACRA Success
description: With so much emphasis on how to report 2017 MACRA QPP data, it is easy to lose sight on what to report and whether your data is sound. Learn more in this blog.
